characteristics.name: Stability
characteristics.description: The unchanging ground beneath our feet, the foundation of all existence

characteristics.name: Fertility
characteristics.description: The womb of life, source of crops, food, and abundance

characteristics.name: Nurturing
characteristics.description: Mother Earth who feeds, shelters, and sustains all her children

characteristics.name: Endurance
characteristics.description: The patient strength of mountains, stones, and endless plains

characteristics.name: Grounding
characteristics.description: Connection to the physical, the material, the tangible reality

characteristics.name: Growth
characteristics.description: Seeds sprouting, roots deepening, life emerging from soil

characteristics.name: Cycles
characteristics.description: Seasons turning, death feeding new life, eternal renewal

characteristics.name: Body
characteristics.description: Physical form, flesh and bone, the material vessel

characteristics.name: Burial
characteristics.description: Return to earth, the final resting place, dust to dust

characteristics.name: Abundance
characteristics.description: Harvest, wealth, material prosperity from earth's bounty
